quotes.quote: Without Sunday, I wouldn't know when to put on the brakes of a hurtling life.
Let this Sunday be: A day to reflect, a day of respect. For all you have been blessed. Let your joy be expressed.
Without Sunday as my day of rest, my honey-do list would beckon me.
Happy Sunday. Whatever you've got planned, enjoy. Wishing you a restful, peaceful, beautiful day.
On Sundays, we do nothing.
Give lots of smiles this Sunday!
Better days are coming. They are called Saturday and Sunday.
Do not let Sunday be taken from you. If your soul has no Sunday, it becomes an orphan.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: Sunday and chill.
Imagine living a life where every day is your Saturdays and Sundays. Make every day your weekend. Make every day a play-day.
Good morning! Surround yourself with positive people who'll give you bright emotions, and Sunday will be unforgettable!
My definition of Sunday Funday is to do nothing and chill.
Sunday is the core of our civilization, dedicated to thought and reverence.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Sundays tend to be a day where I just do nothing but visit people. It's kind of like trick-or-treating.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: A Sunday well spent brings a week of content.
Today, give yourself a break. Happy Sunday!
Good morning. Start where you are, use what you have, do what you can. Happy Sunday.
On Sunday, I think the most important thing for me is to just turn my brain off.
Sunday on the beach, having seashells in the pocket, sand in the shoes, was the day to refuel our souls and be grateful for the blessings.
Be generous this Sunday and in the coming week, and you will find happiness!
Sunday, for me, is all about being home with the family with no plans.
Sunday. A day to refuel your soul and be grateful for your blessings. Take a deep breath and relax. Enjoy your family, your friends, and a cup of coffee.
Have a great Sunday! Don't forget that, while an experience may be good or bad, it will always help you learn and grow.
Sundays are made for sipping rosé with the besties.
Hello Sunday. May you be blessed with love in your heart, happiness in your home, peace in your soul, and joy in your life.
She swears lazy Sundays were made for her. Doing whatever it is she wants to do, even if it is nothing at all.
The frantic pace of life is only interrupted by the quietness of Sunday.
Happy Sunday morning! Let's crawl under a big blanket and watch movies.
Sunday is the perfect day to refuel your soul and to be grateful for each and every one of your blessings.
Smiles are prettier than frowns, giving is warmer than receiving, and loving is more beautiful than hating. Smile this Sunday.
Sunday – The day I planned a lot but actually do nothing.
It's Sunday. I don't move on Sundays.
Smile because it is Sunday!
Happiness is waking up early and suddenly realizing it's Sunday.
